statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, product_name, regulatory_category FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE regulatory_category = 'FDA';
SELECT id, product_name, regulatory_category FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE marketing_practice = 'Ethical';
SELECT id, product_name, regulatory_category FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, regulatory_category FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE consumer_communication IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, regulatory_category FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT product_name, regulatory_category, marketing_practice FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE marketing_practice = 'Ethical Marketing';
SELECT id, product_name FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE regulatory_category = 'Health';
SELECT regulatory_category, consumer_communication FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM marketing_practices;
SELECT company_name, practice_description FROM marketing_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, practice_date FROM marketing_practices ORDER BY practice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM consumer_communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT company_name, communication_content FROM consumer_communications WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_practices WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT company_name, practice_description FROM marketing_practices WHERE practice_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM consumer_communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, MAX(communication_content) AS latest_content FROM consumer_communications GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT practice_date, COUNT(*) AS practice_count FROM marketing_practices GROUP BY practice_date ORDER BY practice_count DESC, practice_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingPractices;
SELECT product_name, marketing_channel FROM MarketingPractices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, communication_type, communication_date FROM ConsumerCommunications ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT regulatory_document_id, compliance_status FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MarketingPractices ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, marketing_channel FROM MarketingPractices WHERE marketing_strategy LIKE '%social%';
SELECT * FROM ConsumerCommunications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, communication_type FROM ConsumerCommunications GROUP BY communication_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, compliance_status FROM MarketingPractices INNER JOIN RegulatoryCompliance ON MarketingPractices.id = RegulatoryCompliance.regulatory_document_id;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Team;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM Marketing_Team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT material_type, material_description FROM Marketing_Materials WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM Marketing_Compliance_Regulations WHERE regulation_id = 5;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM Consumer_Communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Team;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM Marketing_Compliance_Regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_type, material_description FROM Marketing_Materials WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM Marketing_Team WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM Consumer_Communications WHERE material_id IN (SELECT material_id FROM Marketing_Materials WHERE regulation_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM MarketingPractices;
SELECT company_name, regulatory_status FROM MarketingPractices ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, regulatory_status FROM MarketingPractices WHERE regulatory_status='Approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM ConsumerCommunications WHERE communication_type='Email';
SELECT company_name, communication_type FROM ConsumerCommunications WHERE communication_type='SMS' OR communication_type='Phone' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingPractices WHERE regulatory_status='Approved';
SELECT company_name, regulatory_status FROM MarketingPractices ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConsumerCommunications WHERE communication_type='Email' AND consumer_id=12345;
SELECT c.company_name, r.guideline_name FROM ConsumerCommunications c JOIN RegulatoryGuidelines r ON c.communication_type=r.guideline_name WHERE r.description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT ci.issue_name, ci.severity, cl.date_time FROM ComplianceIssues ci JOIN CommunicationLogs cl ON ci.id=cl.communication_id WHERE ci.status='Open' ORDER BY ci.severity DESC, cl.date_time ASC;
